The watch well provides the advertised function and appearance. I have two issues that are worthy of consideration: (1) Removing watchband links is a difficult task. You'd benefit from a excellent eyesight, a bright light, and LOTS of patience. (2) There indeed are luminous watch hands and luminous dots for each hour. If you wear glasses, you may find these are of little use in low light scenarios. I find that if I wake at night and want to check the time the luminosity is useless. My former watch was a Timex that had their "Indiglo" feature that was really great for reading the time in low light conditions.

评论概述: The pins in the wristband come out and don't remain when reinstalled
评论详情: The watch fell off my wrist on day one.  A pin came fully out of the wristband in the first day.  I found and reinstalled the pin.  I thought it was a one-time event but came out most of the way again and I pushed them back in repeatedly within the next weeks.  Now it happens multiple times daily.The watch itself is quite nice but the wristband is dysfunctional.I should have returned this wristwatch on the first day.  Don't buy this watch with the rather odd wristband.
